name: Red Española de Queserías de Campo y Artesanas
goal:
To promote farmhouse and artisans cheese production systems.
To foster the adaptation of Regulations to this specific production system.
To inform citizens about the specificities of farmhouse and artisans cheeses.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Food Safety
euInitiatives:
Le "Paquet Hygiène" concernant la salubrité des denrées alimentaires.
La Qualité et Promotion des produits agricoles.
